typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Unnamed: 0} as string,
		Loan_ID as string,
		Gender as string,
		Marital as string,
		Dependents as string,
		Education as string,
		SelfEmplo as string,
		ApplIncome as string,
		CoApplIncome as string,
		{Loan Amt} as string,
		Term as string,
		CreditHistory as string,
		PropArea as string,
		LoanStatus as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> csvSource
source(output(
		Loan_ID as string,
		Gender as string,
		Marital as string,
		Dependents as string,
		Education as string,
		SelfEmplo as string,
		ApplIncome as string,
		CoApplIncome as string,
		LoanAmt as string,
		Term as string,
		CreditHistory as string,
		PropArea as string,
		LoanStatus as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> parquetSource
source(output(
		{Unnamed: 0} as string,
		Loan_ID as string,
		Gender as string,
		Marital as string,
		Dependents as string,
		Education as string,
		SelfEmplo as string,
		ApplIncome as string,
		CoApplIncome as string,
		{Loan Amt} as string,
		Term as string,
		CreditHistory as string,
		PropArea as string,
		LoanStatus as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> jsonSource
parquetSource select(mapColumn(
		Loan_ID,
		Gender,
		Marital,
		Dependents,
		Education,
		SelfEmplo,
		ApplIncome,
		CoApplIncome,
		{Loan Amt} = LoanAmt,
		Term,
		CreditHistory,
		PropArea,
		LoanStatus
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
csvSource, Select1, jsonSource union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 aggregate(groupBy(Loan_ID),
	each(match(name!='Loan_ID'), $$ = first($$))) ~> RemoveDuplicates
RemoveDuplicates sort(asc(Loan_ID, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SqlSink
